title: Oceanfront Malaysia Borneo Boutique Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Located half an hour from the park-filled city of Kuching - the 'Gateway to Borneo' - this luxurious boutique retreat boats lush gardens, pristine white exteriors and easy access to the region's spectacular natural wonders, including the 740-acre Semenggoh Nature Reserve, home to the endangered Bornean orangutan.

With a 30-metre infinity swimming pool suspended directly above the South China Sea - surrounded by jungle and the endlessly shimmering ocean - this perfectly manicured hideaway is the perfect place to retreat from the world beyond, with just 28 rooms, suites and villas taking inspiration from the indigenous Iban's rich heritage in Borneo.

​Indulge in a feast for all the senses at Kechala restaurant and bar, famous for tantalising dishes infused with Sarawakian flavours, or treat yourself to a mixologist-crafted cocktail at Cove Bar. This secluded spot allows you to discover untouched nature and local culture effortlessly, while away an afternoon in the library and fall asleep each night to the sound of waves.
offer_address: Lot 55, Jalan Sultan Tengah, Santubong, Kuching Sarawak 93010, Malaysia

title: Oceanfront Malaysia Borneo Boutique Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Orangutan Nature Reserve
description:
Located half an hour from the park-filled city of Kuching - the ‘Gateway to Borneo’ - this luxurious boutique retreat boats lush gardens, pristine white exteriors and easy access to the region’s spectacular natural wonders, including the 740-acre Semenggoh Nature Reserve, home to the endangered Bornean orangutan.

Surrounded by jungle and the endlessly shimmering ocean, this perfectly manicured hideaway is the perfect place to retreat from the world beyond, with just 28 rooms, suites and villas taking inspiration from the indigenous Iban's rich heritage in Borneo.

Included in your package is a tour of Semenggoh Orangutan Reserve, offering a once-in-a-lifetime chance to see thriving orangutans in the wild. ​Return and indulge in a feast for all the senses at Kechala restaurant and bar, famous for tantalising dishes infused with Sarawakian flavours, or treat yourself to a cocktail at Cove Bar.

This secluded spot allows you to discover untouched nature and local culture, while away an afternoon in the library and fall asleep each night to the sound of waves. This slice of paradise promises a Malaysian stay that will etch eternal memories in your heart.
offer_address: Lot 55, Jalan Sultan Tengah, Santubong, Kuching Sarawak 93010, Malaysia

title: Malaysia Seafront Hideaway near Kuching with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Cocktails
description:
At the foot of Mount Santubong, near the alluring Sarawak capital, Kuching, is the seafront Cove 55: a place to completely retreat from the rest of the world. This holiday-home-turned-boutique-hotel, with just 28 luxurious rooms, is currently the top-rated property in Kuching on TripAdvisor - and the winner of a Travellers' Choice 2022 Award. Take a stroll through the perfectly manicured gardens and you'll find pristine white exteriors and a 30-metre saltwater infinity swimming pool suspended above the South China Sea, where you'll be tempted to soak until sunset.

Indulge in a feast for all the senses at Kechala restaurant and bar, famous for tantalising dishes infused with Sarawakian flavours, or treat yourself to a mixologist-crafted cocktail at Cove Bar on the Sea Deck. Just a 35-minute drive from Kuching City, this secluded spot is somewhere you can discover pristine nature and local culture effortlessly, while away an afternoon in the library and fall asleep each night to the sound of waves.
offer_address: Lot 55, Jalan Sultan Tengah, Santubong, Kuching Sarawak 93010, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Kuching Sophistication near Sarawak River with Four Restaurants
description:
Soak up the vibrant energy of  'Cat City' with a chic stay at this Pullman sanctuary, nestled in the heart of Kuching, tucked away within Malaysian Borneo. A stone's throw from the Hills Shopping Mall, the hotel's elegantly appointed rooms, paird with panoramic city and river vistas, take advantage of the property's prime location in the Kuching Golden Triangle.

Tuck into pan-Asian cuisine at Puzzle, indulge in authentic Chinese fare with a modern twist at Nu Er Hung and savour bakery delights at Café des Arts. Later, head to Déjà Vu and sip from an impressive collection of wines, beers and cocktails.
offer_address: Interhill Place No. 1A, Jalan Mathies, Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia, 93100

title: Intimate Malaysia Hideaway near Kuching City
description:
Hidden at the foot of Mount Santubong near the alluring Malaysian Borneo capital of Kuching, Cove 55 is the place to completely retreat from the rest of the world. A former holiday home turned intimate hideaway with ranking as Tripadvisor’s #1 property in Kuching, this boutique escape is home to 28 light-filled rooms.

Take a stroll through the perfectly manicured gardens and you'll find pristine white exteriors, tribal-inspired luxury and a 30-metre infinity swimming pool suspended above the South China Sea. The water is gloriously refreshing - you'll be tempted to soak until sunset. Then it's up to Kechala Restaurant & Bar for tantalising dishes infused with Sarawakian flavours, or perhaps the Cove Bar perched on the Sea Deck for a mixologist-crafted cocktail. Less than a 40-minute drive from Kuching City, this secluded spot is somewhere you can discover pristine nature and local culture effortlessly, while away an afternoon in the Library and fall asleep each night to the sound of waves.
offer_address: Lot 55, Jalan Sultan Tengah, Santubong, Kuching Sarawak 93010, Malaysia
